questions.question: The polar orbit scans the whole earth ____ around the earth's poles.
questions.explanation: প্রথম verb এর পর ২য় verb এর সাথে ing যুক্ত হয়। The polar orbit scans the whole earth staying around the earth's poles.

questions.question: This is ____ for studying magnetic and electrical field.
questions.explanation: linking verb+adj
